website_summaries.verdict: Stands out for the great assortment of attachments included.
pros: Automatic detergent mixing means you always get the right amount of soap and water for best results
Includes attachments such as a SpinScrub hand tool, stair tool, crevice tool, and upholstery tool
cons: Users note that it uses a lot of detergent for the area it cleans

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Waste Your Money
customer_reviews.text: I am COMPLETELY disappointed in Hoover for this product. Several months ago, I threw it in the trash because when my husband took it apart to see why it wasn't working anymore, all of the parts were rusted! Are you kidding me... it's a carpet cleaner. I use it alot. I had a more advanced Hoover product before this and used it for about 3 years before it stopped working. I decided to get this because I thought I would spend a little less money and still get the quality. Forget it.... what a piece of trash. Completely wasted my money. I'm done with Hoover.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Don't use the soap reservoir. Super wasteful if you do.
customer_reviews.text: Cleans and picks the liquid back up great, but the separate soap compartment is a total rip off. Don't use it. Just add cleaner straight to your fresh water reservoir unless you want to use 14oz of cleaning solution per gallon. I add the soap to the water side, and then fill the solution side and water side with hot water so I can clean as long as possible. Seems to work well like that.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Gearhart

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well, easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Only used it once, need to run it again! Easy to use, from the water color it seems to have cleaned well. The carpet and room smelled so fresh when I finished. It was easy to clean the fabric furniture too.
customer_reviews.author: Paper SlaveTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Brushes stopped working and vacuum stopped sucking within a year, apparently it's a common problem.
customer_reviews.text: I have had the machine just over a year now and have used it only about six times. The brushes have stopped moving and it seems to be blowing air instead of sucking. Apparently this is a common problem due to internal parts rusting out. The person who decided against spending an extra dollar to manufacture this without stainless steel washers and bearings should be flogged. I now have a soaking wet rug which will probably be ruined with mildew before I am able to get this repaired or replaced. Not only do I need a new carper shampooer, I will probably also need a new rug. Thanks, Hoover!
customer_reviews.author: Danny Internets

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 3 years
customer_reviews.text: The number of components on this machine that are "the weakest link" are numerous. Today was the final straw, dumping water at a prodigious rate into the carpet but not suctioning it back out. I'm done trying to figure out what the problem is THIS time. This was my second, and LAST, Hoover. I used to be OK with these types of items lasting a short time, but it's just a big waste of money. THEY ARE NOT BUILT TO LAST, THEY ARE CHEAP AMERICAN JUNK. I never thought we'd go back to the day where American companies made cheap junk like the cars of the 70s.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Lemon Donaghy

customer_reviews.title: No Heat Supplied
customer_reviews.text: The overall design is great, but I'm disappointed--very upset, actually--that the "heated drying" is due only to using hot water instead of cold! You don't grasp this until you read the instructions carefully, at which time you realize you've been taken in by clever marketing and wishful thinking (again). If you buy this Hoover thinking it generates heat, think again.
customer_reviews.author: MysteryAuthor

customer_reviews.title: When it works, it works well. The mechanism ...
customer_reviews.text: When it works, it works well. The mechanism that uses the suction to spin the brushes has a serious tendency to RUST if left unused for more than a couple of days. If you don't intend to shampoo your carpet every other day, this will probably bring you no end of frustration. I've replace the entire turbine assembly twice now. I have applied marine grease. It just doesn't matter. The internal workings are not constructed to be used anywhere near water...very foresightful then, that these materials are attached to a CARPET SHAMPOO DEVICE!
customer_reviews.author: Yissnakk

customer_reviews.title: Only worked for 45 minutes and stained my carpet
customer_reviews.text: I know this is a relatively inexpensive machine that might not last too long (as other reviewers have noticed) but I expected it to last more than 45 minutes! It seemed to be working okay but after 40 minutes or so it made a weird sound and spit out black soot on my carpet. I still haven't been able to get it out completely. Maybe I just got a lemon as it seems this cleaner works well enough for some people. Luckily I tried it right after it was delivered and I was able to return it through Amazon without a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to purchase a cleaner that didn't have a heater built in it. Was I ever wrong! This cleaner is incredible! I didn't realize how truly awful my carpet was. Not to mention filthy!! I read the reviews, and followed the instructions to make it a three step process. First, go over the carpet with the rinse option. Then go over the wet area with the soap option, and then go over the soapy area with the rinse option. Wowwee! Incredible.
customer_reviews.author: skm526

customer_reviews.title: It did a great job at first but...
customer_reviews.text: I had a really filthy rug, neglected for years - this machine performed admirably getting out all the dirt, after several washings. No performance issues at all. It does a great job for not a lot of money. Update - after a month or so, I went to use again and it will not turn on!. I push the lever and - nothing! Thinking it would work after using it a lot initially, I recycled the box and packing, The return window was a week ago April 28- it dies a little over a week later, May 8 I suggest a more reliable product.
customer_reviews.author: SteveCee23

customer_reviews.title: Does not last. Do it right the first time and buy the big green
customer_reviews.text: It worked for a few months but then the attachments stopped working. It didnt work all that great to begin with, but now the attachment hose does not suck any more water. I tried to save money and buy this since i have a small apartment but in the end I just ended up wasting money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Casas Jr

customer_reviews.title: Read the reviews and watch for common problems, I wish I had
customer_reviews.text: It worked twice, then the pump broke. It leaked all over the floor, so I watched a few YouTube videos on what it could be. I took it apart and sure enough the pump was broke. I never even got the opportunity to use it myself so I can’t even rate the performance when I did work.
customer_reviews.author: Luke M

customer_reviews.title: Be prepared to dump the dirty water a LOT.
customer_reviews.text: All in all this is a good buy for the price. I've not had any issues with the brushes like some other people. Know that you need to buy a LOT of soap for any decent sized carpet. I went through the bottle in the box and another 32oz bottle just with a hallway and a master bedroom that's half covered with furniture. You also have to dump the dirty water bin a ton. I dumped it something like 10 times while shampooing that same area, though about half that when rinsing. That said, the water was filthy, so it was obviously working well.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Weber

customer_reviews.title: Leaking tank...
customer_reviews.text: Okay .. so my only complaint on this is ofcourse... the tank leaks. ... I have had mine a while so a return isnt even optional but... I've only used it 3 times. The pieces arent even sitting in the closet put together when I'm done with it. I wash it after each use and lay it out to dry for days at a time just to be sure theres no mold issues.. it's a great shampooer. I love it. I am currently trying to find solutions to the leaking tank as we speak but... as of right now... nothing. Good luck to who buys it. But it is a great cleaner!!!
customer_reviews.author: Boo

customer_reviews.title: GOOD PRICE WORKS VERY GOOD
customer_reviews.text: I OWNED THE EXACT MODEL FOR 4 YEARS, USED FOUR TIMES PER YEAR. GOOD SYSTEM WORKS WELL. SERIOUS ISSUE (DESIGN FLAW) WITH MAIN METAL GEAR THAT RUSTS AND SIEZES THE NYLON GEARS, PREVENTING ROTATION OF THE BRUSH. I REPAIRED THIS ISSUE ONCE TWO YEARS AGO. THERE ARE NO REPLACEMENT PARTS AVAILABLE TO REPAIR THIS GEAR. I FORCED THE GEAR FREE AND GREASED IT CAUSING IT TO LAST TWO MORE YEARS THEN SUFFERED THE TERMINAL FAIL. THIS ENGINERING DESIGN SHOULD BE CORRECTED HOWEVER UNLIKELY AS THEY WILL LIKELY REPLACE THE MODEL. I READ WHERE MANY SUFFER THIS EXACT ISSUE. THE PRICE IS GOOD SO I BOUGHT ANOTHER WITH EXPECTATION OF THE SAME FAILURE EVENTUALLY. UNTIL THEN, GREAT PERFORMANCE OTHERWISE.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on Prime Day for myself for my birthday...cuz that's the kind of thing old people buy themselves. I knew my carpets needed cleaned, but I was grossed out at how black the dirty water was that came up. It does come with the stairs attachment and all kinds of additional tools. I will say that it is heavy, expecially when filled with fluid and water. This makes cleaning the stairs a little difficult but it's completely doable. I do need to pre-treat some spots and go over them again. I am happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: mariah genco

customer_reviews.title: SENIORS CAN USE
customer_reviews.text: As a senior who has always done her own cleaning, I needed something I could handle. This is a fantastic unit, that is easiest for me to use. The unit is well made and comes with many extras. I had power washed my carpets last year, rolled them up and didn't use them, I decided to rewash with this carpet cleaner and could not believe how much dirt this unit picked up. I did months of research on cleaners and this came out on top. Quality, Extra accessories and price this unit is the best all around.
customer_reviews.author: reen5horse

customer_reviews.title: Suctions well
customer_reviews.text: This thing is heavy. But with that comes good suction and a better clean than other cleaners. It heats up the water and doesn't leave water in the carpet as long as you take your time. You will get a bit of an arm workout. The hose connection is a bit frustrating at first. I used the connections to clean my couch. I'm happy with the result. However be careful when using the hose and connections. As you squeeze the nozzle to clean upholstery or stairs, the water sprays all over. So it would pool up on the couch when I turned it sideways. But again just suction that water up and keep going. Very hard work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome deep cleaning
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely no one is allowed in my home with their shoes on. I thought that my carpet’s were clean. Man was I surprised 😮 My house is wall to wall carpeting (a dark cream) I purchased this carpet cleaner because I just wanted to refresh my carpet. I was expecting a light Beige water to fill the water disposal. What I actually got was dark mucky water. Smh. Either this product is that good, or someone’s been wearing shoes in my house. Actually it gives a deep deep cleaning which is what my carpet needed.
customer_reviews.author: Lea

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Hoover is a well known brand. So when seeing this I thought hey must be good. It's small which isn't bad. But if you have stains you have to use the hand attachment and use some elbow grease to really scrub those stains. If you just want to freshen up your carpets this would be good for you but even light stains you have to really scrub to get up. This is my 4th carpet cleaner and by far the worst of them. The others still worked but I had moved and gave them to friends or family. This one I wouldn't bother even giving to someone. I would just throw is away. It's not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: J. D. Conrad

customer_reviews.title: Second time I bought this
customer_reviews.text: Why? Because it works well. First one was used for almost 6 years so I got my moneys worth out of it. Rented one of the machines from the local retailer and it didn't do much good. Decided to buy this again as the old one was left behind in the move. Had no hesitation buying this again as it worked so well the first time. It's still a good machine, great value for the money. I will buy another one when this one poops out.
customer_reviews.author: Edmond

customer_reviews.title: Awful worthless vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Awful product. Where do I start: 1) it leaks water. Leaks all over the stairs and the floor. 2) Constantly have to change the dirty water and add more clean water. I have never had a vacuum where I can't even make it thru 1 small room without having to change dirty water add more clean water. It's ridiculous. 3) To clean 4 small rooms, I went thru 3 large bottles of cleaner. How does this happen??? With my old vacuum, a large bottle would last me thru several cleaning sessions--almost a full year! 4) It didn't even clean my rooms. There are still dirt spots all over the place. So disappointed in this vacuum. Absolutely hate it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Suzi B.

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Really dissapointed i just bought it few months ago and it doesnt work anymore the brush is not spining anymore i even tried using the brush that comes with the handle and even that one doesnt spin either really dissapointed about this i paid 140+ for this item that i only used 2-3 times and its not working right anymore. I also put water where its suppose to go and notice it sprays soap with it too. I contacted amazon about it and they just said they cant do anything about it really disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Mr. & Mrs B

customer_reviews.title: Product OK, Service is terrible
customer_reviews.text: Our unit was missing some screws to attach the handle. Getting them was a monumental effort and they ended up only sending one of the two screws that we needed to finish the unit. We ended up searching through our garage to find a useable replacement. The phone representatives seemed to go out of their way to be bureaucratic and less than helpful. Once we jimmied the unit together it seemed to work as advertised and did improve a carpet that had not seen a decent cleaning in a while.
customer_reviews.author: Wild Smurf

customer_reviews.title: I can't say enough good things about this machine!
customer_reviews.text: This is SUCH an improvement from my 6 year old Hoover! Water AND cleaning solution tanks have a lot more capacity. Easy dumping dirty water, and I mean DIRTY water! And the RINSE feature is fantastic! You can't go wrong with this machine. The only bad thing I can say is the dirty water tank shuts down pretty fast and it's hard to tell when it happens as the sound difference is so minute, and no warning that the clean water tank is empty, as the sound difference again is so minute. But I think once you get used to the machine, it will be easier to tell when it happens. Wonderful cleaner!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Blomquist

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!
customer_reviews.text: When using this unit for the 2nd time I found the brushes seized. This seems to be a common problem with this model which is caused by sub-standard parts that rust after one use. There are youtube videos that explain how to correct this issue, but if the rust is excessive, you will have buy the replacement part - which is available here on Amazon. It's called a "Hoover turbine assembly, spin Scrub". I would advise staying away from Hoover; there's really no excuse to have to replace internal parts after a single use. Buyer Beware!
customer_reviews.author: Brian D.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research before this purchase. I’ve had the opportunity to use the cleaner and I’m very happy! The suction is good, it’s easy to handle, and cleanup is a breeze. It’s easy to take apart and fill with cleaner and water. So far I love it.
customer_reviews.author: VivG

customer_reviews.title: Good Suction Power
customer_reviews.text: I tested the carpet cleaner in only a small hallway area of the house. The machine definitely has good suction power, as the carpet was fairly dry in about an hour. There were no stains on the carpet, so I cannot provide an opinion about stain removal. The fibers on my carpet were flattened from foot traffic, so I had hoped the carpet cleaner would help fluff up the fibers. That didn't happen. After the carpet was fully dry, the fibers looked the same as before cleaning. Other than that, the carpet cleaner does the job. It is not heavy, so easily transportable from floor to floor. Also, easy to assemble and use.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Designed With Ease In Mind
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this for my grandmother who typically struggles using and moving around vacuums and carpet scrubbers due to her lack of height (only about 5 foot tall) and their weight, but this one has proved to be a good choice! It's very lightweight and because it has multiple handles for carrying, she's able to use it without any issue and take it up and down the stairs fairly easily. It also does a beautiful job of getting her carpets clean! The SpinScrub rotating brushes have definitely lived up to all the hype and do a much better job of cleaning her carpet than her previous carpet cleaner with traditional scrubbing action.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Myers

customer_reviews.title: It gets clogged very easily.
customer_reviews.text: It worked for 2 years. I was impressed with it at first but quickly noticed that it gets "clogged" and forced quite easily... at least 4 times every time I'd use it. I have normal pile carpet and I always pre vacuum before washing yet it would still manage to get clogged. It would start making a forced, high pitched sound- so I'd turn it off and check the brushes. Knots of hair (I don't have pets) and carpet fibers would somehow gather and affect the machine's performance. My husband was using it while using head phones so he didn't notice the sound and the machine burn out. It started smelling like burn rubber and it stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Pandiiland

customer_reviews.title: very good for small jobs
customer_reviews.text: works as expected, just not quite sure how to control the volume of discharging both detergent or water, both goes down relatively fast. pretty much just squeeze the handle and go. i used it clean up dog droppings on carpet and it does the job well. however i do vaccume with dyson before the cleaning, i do not expect this to do the carpet cleaning better than dyson, but to revive the carpet or tile. it does the job and i am happy.
customer_reviews.author: squid wagner

customer_reviews.title: Who knew that vacuuming would give me joy?!
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I'm either getting old by getting excited over a vacuum cleaner or this is actually a great product!! I'm thinking the latter!! We've always paid someone to clean our carpets but, was always left feeling "Meh, I can't believe we just paid someone that much moolah!" BUY THE VACUUM as an investment!! I've cleaned every single room in my house as well as our couch because I just couldn't stop... my house just feels sooo much cleaner!!
customer_reviews.author: Geoff Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: A great cleaner
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this cleaner to spot clean but I ended up doing my entire living room. It is easy to use, has great suction power and is easy to clean. Now, I clean my carpets more often and with ease. On my stairs, it worked okay...but due to the wand tool, the suction is not strong enough to really pull the water back up. So, it took some time for the stairs to dry. Overall, would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Elly

customer_reviews.title: Doggy Doodoo smell is no longer
customer_reviews.text: I went on a small vacation to visit my Grandma, when I got back I found out one of my three dogs had a nightmarish accident resulting in four large piles of doggie doodoo with a consistency of frozen yogurt soft serve. The smell that was creating in that room is enough to make a grown man cry. Nonetheless one must preserve and move on with life, and with the help of the Hoover Power Scrub Deluxe Carpet Cleaner, I have been able to do that. After two passes, the stain, odor and all history of any accident has been removed, returning the room to a wonderful, odorless, non smelling room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Carpet?  Don’t be frugal -  Buy a BELT DRIVEN unit.
customer_reviews.text: Having owed 2 prior generation units BOTH having brush vacuum motor failure I trust the general satisfaction I hold with Hoover (I purchased/self replaced vacuum motor on one of them) this is an “OK” replacement. Down to only 3 carpeted rooms and a household of 2, use is light. Hoover would be smart to dump the “inevitable to fail” vacuum brush motor system and move to a METAL GEAR and BELT DRIVEN brush system. 😳 Less cost than prior generation model 😠 Current generation model is 2-3 inches more NARROW - SMALLER WATER reservoirs. BAD for large rooms/use. 😠 cleaning head very LIGHWEIGHT - less downward pressure for brush scrubbing. Easier to haul up/down stairs.
customer_reviews.author: David H. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Worst carpet cleaner I have owned....
customer_reviews.text: I always hesitate to write a bad review. BUT, this thing is junk. After 8 months...the scrubbers are not moving. But going back to the first week...some type of spring broke in the release that holds the handle up. So that hasn't worked correctly from the first week. We have had to rig it to stay upright in the closet. I have owned about 3-4 of these things over the years. Just like Vacuums...they don't hold up over time. But this one is particularly low quality. Good luck!
customer_reviews.author: matcon

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of this exact same shampooer. The first one we purchased lasted about 3 years and we use it regularly and I felt that it held up pretty good but the bearing kept going out at the end. I purchased this second one in December my support window closed the end of May and yesterday the new one died. I am not happy and there doesn't appear to be any way to contact Hoover through Amazon now that my service window closed. I think since December we have only used it a handful of times and I am really quite displeased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent
customer_reviews.text: I know gross 🤢I have 2 children and 2 large dogs, Mia that with a light covered rug.... gross. My steam cleaner broke and the carpets have been driving me insane, to the point of embarrassment so I finally broke down and bought this one. Was a great price and definitely did the job. The amount of dirt it pulled out is incredible. I seriously can’t believe how much came up. I’m very happy with my purchase and feel so much better about my rugs.
customer_reviews.author: Plonka89

customer_reviews.title: Dry carpet within 2 hours
customer_reviews.text: This is lightweight, easy to use and clean afterwards. After throughly cleaning my rooms one by one I can now do spot cleaning as needed. A 12 x14 room took me 2 hours but that's because I wanted them ultra clean. I used the machine very slowly so that the cleanser and brushes did their job. Then used the rinse only to get the cleanser up and out. Since my dog is blind and elderly now she has mishaps which I can now clean up fast and the carpet dries quickly. Loving this machine. Tips: Use hot water and use a corn holder thing to clean the lint out of the brushes.
customer_reviews.author: Can Cann

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for the price
customer_reviews.text: Replaced an old Bissel. This was a pleasant surprise in that it has every bit as good of suction power as the Bissel when it was new, but also did a better job cleaning overall. The scrubbing brushes do a great job of fluffing up the old carpet - better than the beater bar of the other brand. Oh yeah, the carpet is nearly 30 years old, and has been well taken care of in all that time, and this helped rejuvenate it just a little more again. I would definitely recommend it to anyone experienced with home carpet cleaners.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Millard

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy, it seems that after one use ...
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy, it seems that after one use the Power Scrub Brushes will not rotate. The problem is the bearings for the brushes rust after getting wet from normal use.. You use it once and put it in storage and when you go to use it again the brushes will not turn. Hover will repair it under warranty with in a year. The replacement part is the same as the original so the same thing will occur again, more than likely after the warranty is expired. Hoover should address this problem with stainless steel replacement parts.
customer_reviews.author: Texas67

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: After my Hoover PowerDash’s motor broke, I decided to purchase this bad boy. Let me tell ya, it’s worth the money. Easy to set up, easy to use, and it does a fantastic job. My favorite part is that there are two options for cleaning—one for Wash with a solution and another for Rinse. The clean water tank isn’t super big but being able to rinse the carpet without using an entire tank with solution and then refilling the clean tank with fresh water...wow. My only minor complaint is that the dirty water tank is tinted, so you don’t get that satisfaction of seeing what filth you’ve been living in until you toss the dirty water. Otherwise, worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaning at a minimal price
customer_reviews.text: The carpet cleaner does a very good job in cleaning carpets relatively quickly. I can clean four rooms in a couple of hours. It has separate reservoirs for both the water and cleaning solution and changing (or adding) water, cleaning solution, and dirty water is very easy to do. It also has a separate attachment that makes cleaning the stairs or furniture very easy. The price is very reasonable, costing about the same as a professional cleaning the whole house one time. And, of course, it can be used for many applications. All in all, this is a good buy!
customer_reviews.author: DeltaForce61

customer_reviews.title: No longer a quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Seemed to clean well but once I cleaned it and set aside to dry it leaked and was wet for 5 days. ( I suspect it has a flow control issue.). I called hoover and thier customer service said look up the issues on youtube, so no real customer support services from hoover. FYI, I did look on you tube and any thing I could have done to fix the problem would have voided my warranty. The other option was to return it & get my money back. Before you buy it,be sure you read the reviews about issues & check out YouTube.
customer_reviews.author: pat bosi

customer_reviews.title: It’s a good deal
customer_reviews.text: Even though it was a used machine, but the function is exactly the same as the new one. So cost performance is very high, I think it’s a good deal. My carpets were absolutely destroyed from my toddler and his food messes, so I decided to buy this machine have a try. Now my carpets have deep clean with it and my house looks much cleaner than before. Love the separate compartments for dirty water, clean water and cleaning product.
customer_reviews.author: tianjiaran

customer_reviews.title: but I had a cleaning service come out and the level of cleanliness of carpet after the professional cleaner was done was remarkably better. Don't fool yourself into thinking this is something ...
customer_reviews.text: So, aside from amazon shipping issues (the first item i received was missing parts), the second one just leaked a ton of water on the carpet. Did it clean? sort of.... but I had a cleaning service come out and the level of cleanliness of carpet after the professional cleaner was done was remarkably better. Don't fool yourself into thinking this is something you'll be able to do better/cheaper than a professional cleaner. You can't and won't!
customer_reviews.author: Marco

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cleaning machine
customer_reviews.text: Works really well I have a very light colored carpet and it did a great job at cleaning it, bringing it back up to it’s former glory Well put together and very easy to use Definitely worth the money I did have an old Hoover but this is definitely a better upgrade
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Gorman

customer_reviews.title: Hoover doesn't last long anymore
customer_reviews.text: Used my carpet cleaner maybe 10 times but warranty is over. It just stopped working no power went to dump and refill, it was running just fine now no power at all. I think the motor died no click noise or anything just dead, done with Hoover back to Bissell. Thank God a friend brought theirs over so I could suck up the water.😕hover used to be a good brand must be made in China now
customer_reviews.author: Wendy A. Holland

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I shouldn’t buy this carpet cleaner. First of all it’s so heavy that make it painful to use it. Not good for deep clean. Some old stains are still there after wash. Not enough suction power. It takes up to 6 more hours for my carpet to dry out, which is unacceptable. Will return it. Look else where, don’t waste your time like I did.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Best Carpet Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This is a great machine. It is relatively light weight and easy to use. The independent tanks, one for the dirty water and one for clean water. The clean water tank also has a compartment for the cleaning solution, which automatically mixes when the dial is set to wash. This leads me to the next great feature, the wash/rinse dial. Being able to rinse the soap out of the carpet or upholstery is super important. You do not want a soapy build up. Clean-up is easy, because it is easy to dismantle, clean, and reassemble. My personal experience with this machine has seen old stains removed, color refreshed, with no damage to fabric or carpet.
customer_reviews.author: C. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality product
customer_reviews.text: Broke on second use- luckily still within the return period for amazon. Machine was powered on for several minutes before it suddenly died and would not power on again. Contacted Hoover to see what solution they had, and they recommended lugging the machine to a service provider for repair. Closest repair shop was nowhere near my home and I needed a functional carpet cleaner sooner rather than later, so I opted to return and purchased a bissell instead. Much happier now.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie N. Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed,  received a used item with parts missing
customer_reviews.text: I have not yet used the item. I took it out of the box to put it together and immediately noticed there's standing water under the water tank and item f, the spinscrub attachment is missing and item j as well as item I had dog hair on it. This item has OBVIOUSLY been used. I'm VERY disappointed. If I didn't live 2 hours from a ups store I WOULD be so ding it back.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: You will need to replace in a year.
customer_reviews.text: This was the third Hoover Carpet cleaner that I've purchased... You figured I would've learned my lesson by now. Bottom line, they work great at first until the brushes stop spinning at which point only the suction works. All three cleaners did not last past 1 year of use. we do use it about once a month but nothing that justifies them breaking after a few uses. Will now look to other options, not Hoover. Unless you want to replace it on a yearly basis, stay away and invest in a pricer options.
customer_reviews.author: HortGuy

customer_reviews.title: Good for low pile Synthetic fiber
customer_reviews.text: It is good for surface level fresh messes. All the gross things on top and maybe 1/2 of the way through carpet. Even when spots are fully saturated with cleaner, the brushes and suction do not have the power to lift old stains. Tank is pretty small too, had to keep refilling and emptying. I have a medium pile carpet. It may work better on low pile. If you have a high pile carpet, skip this one if you need a thorough deep clean. This frayed the medium pile natural fiber. Carpet used to be thin woven/braided pieces like yarn. It combed it out and frayed it. Looks terrible in some spots now.
customer_reviews.author: z9

customer_reviews.title: Lasted less than a year
customer_reviews.text: It was great while it lasted. Simple to use, good suction, and easy to disassemble for cleaning. The stair/upholstery tool didn’t work so well. I’ve never found those attachments to ever have nearly enough suction. Anyway, less than a year of use once or twice a month and it leaks all over the floor with every use. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cara L. Wahlgren

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: Literally use this thing every week to spot clean pet messes or give the upholstery a good scrub! I’ve used it on the stairs, the sectional, pretty much every room ever, and then some. All the handles and attachments are super great and are easy to clean! The only tricky bit is the main dirty water container can be a little hard to clean sometimes so I recommend using a kitchen spray hose or spray bottle to get the smaller areas! Toothbrushes work well too if the handles is bendy!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous4296

customer_reviews.title: Like it better than a professional cleaning
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Hoover scrubber we have purchased. The first one we had for over twelve years and it was borrowed and used by other family members also so it was really put to the test and passed! We feel like it did so well for so long and in doing so, saved us a lot of money! When it quit functioning at its best, we wanted another Hoover Power Scrub. We are very happy with the new machine also! We cleaned carpets before Christmas but one of our grandsons had an accident that required us pulling it out again on Christmas morning! Very quick, convenient, and efficient. We highly recommend this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Lois Martin

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how I lived life w.o a carpet cleaner! I used this for the 1st time and I am soooo satisfied. The carpet isn't super damp (keep in mind it is new) but it is significantly visibly cleaner! It was kinda gross yet satisfying. 2 yr old puppy piddle stains came out!! And the smell is gone!!! hahaha I'm also pleased w how little water it used to clean a quarter of my slightly above average sized livingroom. I used the pet cleaner w stain guard and worried it wouldn't smell good. It smells fresh but its not strong.
customer_reviews.author: ShilohLauren

customer_reviews.title: Works great, light weight!
customer_reviews.text: Did a good job. I have old carpet so I didn’t have high expectations for how clean they would look afterwards because I’ve used a ton of store carpet cleaning machines and they never really did the trick. I did my office and living room and even my stairs and ottoman to check out the cleaning tools for small jobs. Here’s a few before and after pics. Mind you, this carpet it almost 11 years old.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Nice little cleaner.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace a much larger Bissell pet machine. Now that we no longer have pets this smaller machine is an awesome replacement. It's light and easy for me to push back and forth. It does a good job pulling dirt from the carpet and leaving the carpet reasonably dry. I have used it three times and am happy with the cleaning performance. The only downside is the cheap, brittle plastic everything. Treat it like a delicate baby and all should be fine for awhile but it won't last for hard use.
customer_reviews.author: Maryanne Pennington

customer_reviews.title: It appeared to not be doing a very good job. I checked the scrubbing brushes and they ...
customer_reviews.text: If I could, I would give this zero stars. Ordered this Hoover scrubber and will never buy another Hoover product. The scrubber arrived on Monday and I shampooed one room and hallway. It appeared to not be doing a very good job. I checked the scrubbing brushes and they were not rotating. Called Hoover customer service and was told the "turbine" was not working. Returned product to Amazon and they sent another one. Received it on Thursday... it doesn't work either!!!!! And now I am stuck with Hoover detergent that I ordered because Amazon will not take it back. This is not a cheap machine.. but don't buy it... save yourself the grief!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie May I

customer_reviews.title: Can't get replacement part
customer_reviews.text: I've had this about a year and a half, used it maybe 4 or 5 times. It did a fine job until it started dumping water out the bottom. I took it apart, and found some screw mounts on the turbine pump cracked and lost its water-tightness. According to replacement parts web sites, this part has been discontinued. My only option seems to be a used one from a machine that was parted because the outside was eaten by rats. I'm not going to buy another Hoover if I can't get parts for them.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: Cleans carpets well and is relatively easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Cleans carpets well and is relatively easy to use. I do feel like it left my carpets relatively damp afterwards despite the heat drying, but this could be user error since this is the first carpet cleaner I have ever used. I also used this when my dog had the stomach bug and (unfortunately) had diarrhea all over the carpet. After cleaning it up the best I could, I whipped out this carpet cleaner. I went over it with water 2-3 times and then went over it with the shampoo, then water a couple more times. NO STAIN!! This alone makes the damp carpets a minor complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin

customer_reviews.title: I Have been very pleased using it perhaps five times
customer_reviews.text: This machine was purchased September 2017. I Have been very pleased using it perhaps five times. I would have given it five stars. However, yesterday I was cleaning our family room carpet, it started making a noise, then a bad smell. Turned it off, now it won’t power on. Says it has a two year limited warranty so it should be still covered. I am not mechanical, would have no use for being sent a new part. Very unhappy at this time. Not only is my carpet very wet (half the room) but carpet was not rinsed which is a great feature of this machine.
customer_reviews.author: audrey osborn

customer_reviews.title: Hoover does not stand by its products
customer_reviews.text: I used it ONE TIME on a chair in the lobby of my office. From the start, it didn't work--the hose would not dispense the cleaning fluid. They are not honoring the warranty because I used it in a "commercial setting". Are you kidding me? The chair is smaller than half of the furniture in my house....and it never worked....so it wasn't like it was voided after weeks and multiple times using it in that setting (wear and tear). Don't buy from Hoover--they don't stand behind their products!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought it was great, it does a wonderful job on carpets. Half the reason I bought it, however, is so I could clean my couches. All I have been able to get it to do it dribble/pour out water when I use the upholstery tool. It is supposed to spray it evenly. I have read and re-read the manual and searched for a solution online and come up short handed. I bought the insurance and am hoping that will help. This thing may just have to go back If the issue can't be resolved. Hoover used to be a quality company, but it seems they just make cheap crap and cut corners like everyone else now :(
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Good product not enough support
customer_reviews.text: Good decent lightweight cleaner, unfortunately no replacement parts are offered and I had to recently throw it out after 3 years. I have 2 dogs and 3 cats all.of which barf and occasionally relief themselves inside the house, this cleaner dutifully served its purpose and finally gave when the turbine leaked and rusted the bearing for the brushes causing them to seize and not spin. Upon a short search I realized that the turbine is not available as it is discontinued, leaving me a bit disappointed because my wife and I really loved this cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: This thing works great.
customer_reviews.text: Here is a quick review. Plus 1. Its not expensive 2. It works great. I mean really really good removing dirt. 3. Sucks up the water pretty good Bad 1. It should be one tank to empty dirty water and fill clean water. 2. When your new, you have to lower the handle to install/remove the tank. If you get really familiar with it, you could avoid lowering the handle. But you have to align the lower tabs and latch it which is kinda overkill. This is a perfect carpet cleaner if you do not want to spend a lot of money but want great results.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley West

customer_reviews.title: If this machine breaks, as mine did, don't count on getting replacement parts
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with the design and function of this machine initially. I felt it was well engineered and performed exactly as it should. Unfortunately, after 20 months and approximately (10) uses, a small interior plastic housing piece broke and after identifying the problem, I find the part is not available from Hoover or any of the major parts warehouses. Without this part, the brushes will not turn and the machine is useless. There are numerous youtube videos which address issues with brush failures and the fixes are straight forward but without the ability to purchase parts for a machine that is currently being sold, I cannot recommend this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Rob W.

customer_reviews.title: Came without all the attachments
customer_reviews.text: I've had Hoover shampooers for many many years. This is good for smaller rooms, steps and halls as it has a narrow head . It is light weight, cleans the carpet well and helps with smells left by my puppy. Sucks up the water very well and is fast drying. It has a separate wash and then a rinse at the turn of a dial so you do not leave chemicals on your floor. Amazon did not make right on the hand held spin brush so I ordered one from Hoover. Now all is clean and smelling good
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. It is a great cleaning machine. I didnt realize how dirty our carpet in the family room were until I bought this machine. I vaccum all the time but I guest that is not enough. This room is a high traffic area for the family and a dog. I rinsed first and then shampooed. Then rinsed after. It is helpful to do a couple of suction passes back over carpet post rinse to remove excess water and speed drying time. This thing was worth every penny. I even used it to shampoo the couch after a friends daugther had a accident on it. Came out pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great product and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I got this product after getting a puppy. During potty training we had to do lots of spot cleaning and this was always at the ready. It has enough suction and power to do deep thorough cleaning. It is easy enough to push and use that my 10 year old can use it without to much effort. The tanks are easy to clean and rinse. It is pretty large to do the stairs unless you use help. I have also used this to clean up messes from the floor and upholstery in my car with great success. It is a quality and easy to use product!
customer_reviews.author: Devina Dotson

customer_reviews.title: Missing items
customer_reviews.text: There were supposed to be 2 small screws with the product. They were not there in the box. I know this is such a small thing, but if they were supposed to be there, then I expect them to be there. Thank goodness, I am a collector of nails, nuts, and screws, and we found 2 that fit the machine to hold the hose part. Other than that, am so far satisfied with the carpet cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Atkins

customer_reviews.title: Maybe I had a bad unit..
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I got a bad unit, but it worked terribly. The main problem was the ball that shuts off the vacuum when there is too much water in the recovery tank was constantly shutting off the vacuum -even after I JUST EMPTY AND CLEANED THE TANK. It drove me crazy. I could only do a three foot by four foot section of carpet at a time. Hope the rest of you have better luck.
customer_reviews.author: ChirpingBirdy

customer_reviews.title: Update: Leaks - A LOT
customer_reviews.text: This has good suction and cleans my carpets well, however, it wasn’t long until it started to leak. The water and solution tank freely flows liquid any time the arm is tilted (while you’re using the machine). Half the tank is empty just a little while into the job. Such a waste. I really liked the carpet cleaner until that happened.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar Yahtzee

customer_reviews.title: Worst service ever
customer_reviews.text: First time using, in stocking feet, stepped on on/off and it broke, looked up authorized repair, Alerac, in Boynton beach, took in for warranty repair, on 11/28/2016, now 12/27/2016, says waiting for part will call when ready. Called customer service so far on hold for 26 minutes, recording says press 1 for call back, nothing happens, got on line for live chat, chat not available. Are they out of business? If not should be. Someone picked up after 29 mins, I explained my problem and was told to hold. Now up to 35 mins.Beware do not buy a Hoover product.
customer_reviews.author: paul johnson

customer_reviews.title: Easy To Use And DEEP Cleans
customer_reviews.text: Finally used it, and VERY glad I purchased this. My parents carpeting had not been cleaned for 15 yds at least, and it cleaned it like new. As good as anything you would rent from the stores, or carpet cleaning companies. Easy to use right from the box, instructions are pretty readable and comprehensive. Hoover did a great service to DIYERS. Only thing to mention....dirt tank fills up fast, so prepare yourself for water refills, but cleaner is worth it. Amazon really has good sellers and merchandise. Purchased as black Friday special, worried it might be a lemon.......only in the wonderful scent it leaves the carpeting..really!
customer_reviews.author: Skeptical Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Broke within three months with minimal use.
customer_reviews.text: I’m changing my review. I’ve owned this carpet cleaner since all of three months. Got it for my birthday in May, now Aug. I’ve used it maybe once every other week to carpet clean my couch and stairs. The container now won’t hold water and it drains all over my floors. Used the carpet cleaner liquid that is recommended...not sure why the part that holds water seems to have expanded and doesn’t seal around the edges...if that’s even what happened, don’t know why it would be designed this way.
customer_reviews.author: lauren tarmey

customer_reviews.title: Works like magic
customer_reviews.text: Amazing this along with carpet miracle has revived a 11 year old kid/ pet disgusting beige - carpet. And it the cheapest quality carpet- house builder carpet. First steamer I have ever bought that.cleaned- really cleaned- not just pull top layer of dirt. No stains have reoccured- the 2 items working together I cannot say much more than amazing. Must buy!!! Photo before and after. The after photo is 2 weeks later- there is no stain reoccurring.
customer_reviews.author: Sommerrae

customer_reviews.title: Purchase only to say you own one!
customer_reviews.text: Used 4-6 times. Always cleaned and stored as recommended. Followed directions precisely. Went to use 2 days ago. Cleaned couch front and one cushion and smelled something hot. Shut off unit and unplugged. Lifted product up. Two circular black spots permanently ingrained into white carpet. Moved unit onto front porch. Two more spots left behind on carpet. Motor had seized up leavingoily graphite like marks, each about 4" in diameter. Junk!!!
customer_reviews.author: PLMcC

customer_reviews.title: be prepared to fill and empty till you can't anymore
customer_reviews.text: Had to fill it up a billion times. Good lawd I spent most of the time emptying and filling this thing but other than that the son of a gun works cleaning wise
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Caccamo

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to collect on extended warranty
customer_reviews.text: These vacuums are garbage.lasts 3 months and then they make it impossible to collect on the extended warranty
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Updated HOOVER Carpet Cleaning Machine NG
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this machine to replace our 10 year old Steam Vac (Made in USA). Older model held up well, brushes stopped working and eventually upholstery wand trigger became sticky. This new model seems to vacuum better, but upholstery wand trigger failed much earlier than the old model. New model is louder (screaming louder) and doesn't feel like it will hold up as well as the original Steam Vac. It is cheap since it is made in China, . . . another "quicker" disposable appliance.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Ott

customer_reviews.title: Works well but questionable stamina.
customer_reviews.text: This was a great upgr@de from my grandma's hand me down 1990s model. It cleaned excellently but after less than a year and a half it quit suctioning. We followed the manufacturers routine maintenance specifications as well. We just hope that we aren't left with no scrubber as we fight with the manufacturers to honor the warranty. Other than that it has provided many professional like cleanings for our all carpeted home with 3 cats, 4 dogs and 2-3 children.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Morlan

customer_reviews.title: Poor suction/power
customer_reviews.text: Hoover has always been my "go to" carpet cleaner and every 5 or so yrs I get a new one b/c I shampoo my carpets a lot. But Hoover really messed up their product with this newly redesigned machine. Yeah, it's lighter, and has a new "streamlined" design, but doesn't suck the water or dirt out of the carpet! The suction power is greatly lacking and 6 hours later my carpet is still wet (and not much cleaner), and that's with with my windows open today in the 100 degree heat. I'm sending this machine back. Don't buy it, you'll be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: pauline

customer_reviews.title: It REALLY works!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am amazed at how well this Carpet Cleaner worked!! I had not washed my carpets for ages, and this little scrub monster did away with spots, dirt and the smell that accompanies an old carpet. I am very impressed with how easy it was to use this Hoover machine, and mostly, with how well it worked. The cleaning formula smells divine!! Thanks to this carpet cleaner, I will be deep cleaning my carpets once a month!! Thank you for making such an amazing, efficient and dirt-hungry machine!! I HIGHLY recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Never owned a carpet cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I read some negative reviews about this product, but my experience hasn't been that at all. I have put this little unit through it's paces getting my house ready to sell. I am ashamed of the amount of dirt that's come from my area rugs! And it doesn't get the floor underneath much beyond damp, if even that. I've used the upholstery attachment and was surprised how much better my couch looked! It almost completely removed some grease stains which is impressive. The unit is very easy to handle, and changing the reservoirs for clean water, dirty water and shampoo is very easy.
customer_reviews.author: rebeccawscc

customer_reviews.title: Item was defective
customer_reviews.text: Received a defective product. I filled the clean water reservoir with cleaning solution and water, attached the reservoir and water leaked from the back of the machine. Contacted Hoover directly and they're working to replace it. Im pretty anxious to get it. I purchased it to shampoo the carpet before receiving family for the holiday. I'd like to add that Hoover agreed to replace it but told me I'm responsible for the shipping costs to send it back but they will pay shipping costs to send the replacement. Not sure why I have to be out of pocket more money for their defective product. I called and she said sorry there was nothing they could so.
customer_reviews.author: Ava Steele

customer_reviews.title: Useless unless you want a swimming pool.
customer_reviews.text: The clean water tank leaks as soon as it is placed on the machine. I removed the dirty water tank in the video for a better view. Customer service is unavailable.
customer_reviews.author: CY

customer_reviews.title: Disposable Machine
customer_reviews.text: Bought this machine 2 years ago. I used it maybe 4 times before noticing water pouring out of the bottom without pressing the trigger. Disassembled it and found the motor shell was built of all plastic and cracked in 2 separate places. Tried to fix it with no success. It would cost me about the same amount to replace the motor as it would to buy a new cleaner. I just purchased a Bissell so hoping I have more luck with that.
customer_reviews.author: David R

customer_reviews.title: The name Hoover
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd Hoover carpet cleaner in 19 years. The product works well and is easy to use. I watched over time how this machine not only took out the usual stuff but also slowly removed deep stuff that had been there for a long time. I like that it is easy to see the dirty water pulling out the dirt and stains.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well, but it's short-lived.
customer_reviews.text: First one lasted a little less than a year before it just stopped extracting, leaving the carpets too damp. But it got a LOT of use, so I took a chance on another. The second lasted less than six months and just completely DIED. When it's working, it does a good job - but it just doesn't last. Moving on to another brand.
customer_reviews.author: billfmkg

customer_reviews.title: failed after 2 years
customer_reviews.text: ---update after 2 years the bushes stopped working. out of warranty .... thrown into trash I've owned several carpet scrubbers over the years. This one is hands-down the best I've owned. Easy to operate and does a great job. I love the fact the water in the dirty water tank are separate. The water tank has a separate compartment for the cleaner. The wash rinse is in an easy to access spot. The machine does a great job of removing the water from the carpet which allows for faster drying. The picture is of the rug in our mudroom will we travel in and out every day as you can see the difference is night and day
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Emphasis on the Suction Power
customer_reviews.text: I cleaned my 12 X 9 area rug in about 10 minutes start to dry! This model is lighter, more compact, easier to set up, use, and put away--than the old model it replaced. Solid features include putting down the cleaning solution on the first pass and doing a powerful job of sucking out the dirt and moisture from the carpet. I'm confident the furniture cleaning brushes and accessories will also perform like a champ.
customer_reviews.author: Irish in Carmichael

customer_reviews.title: Cleaned much better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I have a 15 year old carpet which was pretty dirty. In addition, my dog had urinated in many spots. I thought it would clean a lot of the stains but to my surprise it cleaned ALL of the spots completely!! The carpet looks brand new. I would recommend this to anyone who wants their carpets to look new again!
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: A Foam Gasket worth one tenth of one cent breaks this machine
customer_reviews.text: THAT this machine is still on the market is ridiculous. The waste tank has a foam gasket instead of rubber, and it split after 2 uses. The fun part is, Hoover doesn't sell the gasket on their website. So, to give a break down, Hoover sells a machine with a gasket worth about 1/10th of a cent, but doesn't make extra gaskets for purchase. All I'm thinking is they hope people will buy another machine because they have to. This is what happens when everything is made in China.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Great deep cleaning and suction
customer_reviews.text: Deep cleans better than my Bissel and not as heavy. Good suction but hard to tell when it’s out of water or solution if your not paying attention. Stairs are a challenge because I had to use the smaller attachment. It went on easy but gas to stay connected to the larger unit so I had to keep it close and maneuver it up the stairs. The attachment has rotating brushes which is great for cleaning stairs but its small and has a flexible hose so I couldn’t stand up and do it. I was on my hands and knees, and it took forever.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rinse first - Shampoo second - Repeat Rinse!
customer_reviews.text: I decided to wash our carpet after it was professionally washed by a company I always used for my previous house. There were a couple of old pet stains the professionals could not remove with their machine nor by using special chemicals (the previous home owner had a dog who peed in one place numerous times yuk) and I had guests coming, so I decided to refresh the carpet and to work more on these stains. It is amazing how much dirt this little machine was able to pull - after the professional wash! The old stains are lighter, still not completely gone, but they look a lot better.
customer_reviews.author: Xena

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it
customer_reviews.text: Wow this thing is fantastic. We got a puppy a few months ago and it wreaked havoc on our carpet. Two specific areas had a bunch of stains that I couldn’t get out by scrubbing. Literally in about 20 minutes of taking this bad boy out of the box, all the stains were gone and OH MY GOD the water I had to dump out was disgusting! Seeing how much dirt and who knows what else case out of the carpet made me so happy I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Guynn

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Product and I Didn't Start Out a Believer
customer_reviews.text: To say I was shocked how well this worked would be an understatement. Started out testing it on an old area rug and it did amazing. So I tried it on the carpet in our motor home and couldn't imagine the results. They hadn't been cleaned in five years. It's been parked the last four. But we have dogs and grandkids who play in it. Looks like new. When I opened the box I wasn't impressed. The entire thing is plastic. But, it's well made, well thought out and very easy to assemble and use. Easy to load cleaner and to empty waste water. Very Pleasantly Surprised.
customer_reviews.author: Kug
